## now variable

If available, returns wrapper for `process.hrtime.bigint()` else falls back to `Date.now()`<!-- -->. In all cases, returns a nanosec-scale timestamp, either as `bigint` or `number`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
now: (() => bigint) | (() => number)
```
